00061 class OSIMSIMBODYENGINE_API Coordinate : public AbstractCoordinate  
00062 {
00063 //=============================================================================
00064 // DATA
00065 //=============================================================================
00066 
00067 private:
00068     // All coordinates (Simbody mobility) have associated constraints that
00069     // perform joint locking, prescribed motion and range of motion.
00070     // Constraints are created upon setup: locked, precribedFunction
00071     // and range must be set.
00072     // NOTE: Changing the prescribed motion function requires topology to be realized
00073     //       so state is invalidated
00074     //       Enabling/disabling locking, prescribed motion or clamping is allowable 
00075     //       during a simulation.
00076     //       The last constraint to be set takes precedence.
00078     SimTK::ConstraintIndex _prescribedConstraintIndex;
00079     SimTK::ConstraintIndex _lockedConstraintIndex;
00080     SimTK::ConstraintIndex _clampedConstraintIndex;
00081 
00082 protected:
00083     PropertyDbl _defaultValueProp;
00084     double &_defaultValue;
00085 
00086     PropertyDbl _initialValueProp;
00087     double &_initialValue;
00088 
00089     PropertyDbl _toleranceProp;
00090     double &_tolerance;
00091 
00092     PropertyDbl _stiffnessProp;
00093     double &_stiffness;
00094 
00095     PropertyDblArray _rangeProp;
00096     Array<double>& _range;
00097 
00098     PropertyStrArray _keysProp;
00099     Array<std::string>& _keys;
00100 
00103     PropertyBool _clampedProp;
00104     bool &_clamped;
00105 
00108     PropertyBool _lockedProp;
00109     bool &_locked;
00110 
00113     PropertyBool _isPrescribedProp;
00114     bool &_isPrescribed;
00115 
00117     PropertyInt _QTypeProp;
00118     int &_QType;
00119 
00121     PropertyObjPtr<OpenSim::Function> _prescribedFunctionProp;
00122     OpenSim::Function *&_prescribedFunction;

00125     OpenSim::Function *&_restraintFunction;

00128     OpenSim::Function *&_minRestraintFunction;

00131     OpenSim::Function *&_maxRestraintFunction;

00134     bool &_restraintActive;

00182 
00183     virtual bool setValue(double aValue, SimTK::State& theState, bool enforceConstraints=true);

00185     
00186     virtual void getRange(double rRange[2]) const { rRange[0] = _range[0]; rRange[1] = _range[1]; }
00187     virtual bool setRange(double aRange[2]);
00188     virtual double getRangeMin() const { return _range[0]; }
00189     virtual double getRangeMax() const { return _range[1]; }

00192     virtual bool getRangeUseDefault() const { return _rangeProp.getUseDefault(); }

00194     virtual bool setTolerance(double aTolerance);

00207     
00208     // Clamping coordinate between a range of values
00209     virtual bool getClamped() const { return _clamped; }
00210     virtual bool setClamped(bool aClamped);

00212     virtual bool getClampedUseDefault() const { return _clampedProp.getUseDefault(); }
00213

00215     virtual bool getLocked() const;

00218     virtual bool getLockedUseDefault() const { return _lockedProp.getUseDefault(); }
00219 
00220     //Prescribed motion for Coordinate
00221     bool isPrescribed() const {return _isPrescribed;}
00222     void setIsPrescribed(bool isPrescribed);
00223     void setIsPrescribed(bool isPrescribed, SimTK::State& theState);
00224     void setPrescribedFunction(const Function *function);
00225     OpenSim::Function* getPrescribedFunction() const;
00226 
00227     void getKeys(std::string rKeys[]) const;

00229     virtual bool isUsedInModel() const { return true; }
00230     bool isRestraintActive() const { return _restraintActive; }
00231     OpenSim::Function* getRestraintFunction() const;
00232     OpenSim::Function* getMinRestraintFunction() const;
00233     OpenSim::Function* getMaxRestraintFunction() const;
00234     
00235     virtual AbstractTransformAxis::MotionType getMotionType() const { return _motionType; }
00236     // Return true if coordinate is dependent on other coordinates
00237     virtual bool isConstrained() const;
